name: mcp-migration-test
description: Ambiente de teste para migração de API usando MCP

scripts.stop-all: node -e "const { exec } = require('child_process'); const os = require('os'); const cmd = os.platform() === 'win32' ? 'powershell Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 4000,4001,4002,4003 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue ^| ForEach-Object ^{ Stop-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue ^}' : 'lsof -ti :4000,:4001,:4002,:4003 | xargs -r kill -9'; exec(cmd, (err) => { console.log(err ? 'No processes found' : 'Processes stopped'); });"
scripts.praison-math-v1: concurrently --kill-others --names "REST-1.0,MCP-1.0,PRAISON" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run rest-v1" "npm run mcp-v1" "npm run praison-agent"
scripts.praison-math-v1.1: concurrently --kill-others --names "REST-1.1,MCP-1.1,PRAISON" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm run rest-v1.1" "npm run mcp-v1.1" "npm run praison-agent"
